searchableProductInfo.title: Holiday Bayswater patent textured-leather bag
searchableProductInfo.editorsNotes: Supercharge your daywear portfolio with Mulberry's high-octane bright-lemon bag. Crafted from luxe patent textured-leather, the iconic 'Bayswater' has been revamped for SS12 and is a fabulous way to work new-season neon into every look.Shown here with: Lulu Frost necklace, Equipment top, Kenneth Jay Lane ring, Vanessa Bruno skirt, Chlo√© shoes.
